title: Defining and Measuring Disentanglement for non-Independent Factors of Variation
details: A Almudévar, A Ortega, L Vicente, A Miguel, E Lleida - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Representation learning is an approach that allows to discover and extract the factors of variation from the data. Intuitively, a representation is said to be disentangled if it separates the different factors of variation in a way that is …
